short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: An enhanced context menu search. Add and customize multiple search engines to your right-click pop-up menu.
short.da: En forbedret søgning i kontekstmenuen. Tilføj og tilpas flere søgemaskiner til din højreklik-pop op-menu.
short.de: Eine verbesserte Kontextmenü-Suche. Fügen Sie mehrere Suchmaschinen Ihrem Rechtsklick-Popup-Menü hinzu und passen Sie diese an.
short.es: Una búsqueda mejorada en el menú contextual. Agrega y personaliza múltiples motores de búsqueda a tu menú de clic derecho.
short.fi: Paranneltu kontekstivalikko-haku. Lisää ja muokkaa useita hakukoneita oikean klikkauksen popup-valikkoon.
short.fr: Une recherche améliorée dans le menu contextuel. Ajoutez et personnalisez plusieurs moteurs de recherche à votre menu clic droit.
short.hi: संवर्धित संदर्भ मेनू खोज। अपने राइट-क्लिक पॉप-अप मेनू में कई खोज इंजन जोड़ें और उन्हें अनुकूलित करें।
short.ja: 強化されたコンテキストメニュー検索。右クリックポップアップメニューに複数の検索エンジンを追加してカスタマイズします。
short.ko: 향상된 컨텍스트 메뉴 검색입니다. 오른쪽 클릭 팝업 메뉴에 다양한 검색 엔진을 추가하고 사용자 정의하세요.
short.nl: Een verbeterde zoekfunctie in het contextmenu. Voeg meerdere zoekmachines toe en pas ze aan in uw rechtermuisklik-menu.
short.no: En forbedret kontekstmenysøk. Legg til og tilpass flere søkemotorer til høyreklikk-popupmenyen din.
short.ru: Улучшенное контекстное меню поиска. Добавьте и настройте несколько поисковых систем в ваше контекстное меню правого клика.
short.sv: En förbättrad sökning i kontextmenyn. Lägg till och anpassa flera sökmotorer i din högerklick-menyn.
short.zh_CN: 增强的右键菜单搜索。添加并自定义多个搜索引擎到您的右键弹出菜单。
short.zh_TW: 增強的右鍵選單搜索功能。在您的右鍵彈出菜單中添加並自定義多個搜索引擎。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Select text, then right-click to access a fully customizable list of search engines in the pop-up context menu. Modify your search engine list at any time in the options menu.

【Features】
• Drag and drop to reorder your search engines.
• Add multiple search engines with a single click.
• All settings are synced with your Google Account.
• Option to hover right-click instead of highlighting text first.

【Known Issues】
• The hover right-click feature may not work on some webpages.
• The absence of favicons for your search engines has not been overlooked. Chrome currently does not support adding custom icons to the context menu.
long.da,de,es,fi,fr,hi,ja,ko,nl,no,ru,sv,zh_C:
Select text, then right-click to access your fully-customizable list of search engines on the pop-up context menu. You can modify your search engine list anytime in the options menu.

【Features】
• You can drag and drop the order of your search engines.
• Able to add more than 1 search engine per click.
• Settings are all synced to your Google Account.
• Option to hover right-click instead of highlighting text first.

【Known Issues】
• The hover right-click feature will not work on certain webpages.
• The lack of favicons for your search engines has not been overlooked. Adding custom icons on the context menu is currently unavailable for Chrome.
